typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> input
input pivot(pivotBy(ETL_PROC_WID),
	a = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	columnNaming: 'a$NROW_ID$Vb',
	lateral: false) ~> Pivot1
Pivot1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false) ~> sink1
